about_the_game:
Elijah, a brand-new ranger starting his first day at Marshal National Park is ready for the quiet of the off-season. But the sudden disappearance of your supervisor propels you into discovering terrors that never should have been found.

Defended by nothing but what you find along the way, you must do whatever it takes to escape your fate.

SURVIVE

The Wicker Devil is a first person survival horror game. Make your way through tumultuous environments, adapting to your situation with new tools and items to escape this nightmare. The freezing mountaintops and hostile wildlife are all built to take you down. And something has caught your scent...

PHYSICS-BASED INTERACTION

Opening cupboards, doors, and moving objects are all in your control. Solve environmental puzzles to immerse yourself into the escape.

MANUAL WEAPON CONTROL

This game will not reload your weapon for you. You will need to manually complete each step of prepping your weapon- loading bullets, remembering how many you have, and cycling between shots.

INVESTIGATE

Discover the secrets of Marshal National Park.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages.

name: The Wicker Devil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The Wicker Devil is a first-person immersive horror game about a bloodthirsty cryptid that has caught your scent amongst the snowy mountaintops. Interact with puzzles, fight for survival, and scramble for an escape against the nightmares that pursue you.
